import React, { useState } from "react"; import './booking.css' import { Form, FormGroup, ListGroup, Button, ListGroupItem } from "reactstrap"; const Booking = ({ tour, avgRating }) => { const { price, reviews } = tour const [credentials, setCredentials] = useState({ userId: '01', //later it will be dynamic userEmail: 'example@gmail.com', fullname: '', phone: '1234', guestSize: '', BookingAt: '' }) const handleChange = e => { setCredentials(prev => ({ ...prev, [e.target.id]: e.target.value })) }; const ServiceFee = 10; const totalAmount = Number(price) * Number(credentials.guestSize) + Number(ServiceFee); //send data to the server const handleClick = e => { e.preventDefault() console.log(credentials); } return

${price} /per person

{/* Hiện sao đánh giá LEARN */} {avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} ({reviews?.length})
{/* ===booking top=== */}
Information
{/* ===booking top end=== */} {/* ===booking bottom start=== */}
${price} 1 person
${price}
Service charge
${ServiceFee}
Total
${totalAmount}
{/* ===booking bottom end=== */}
} export default Booking //<> Bọc các thẻ lại mà không sinh thẻ HTML thừa
